paper_abstract: We generalize (and hence trivialize and routinize) numerous explicit evaluations of determinants and pfaffians due to Kuperberg, as well as a determinant of Tsuchiya. The level of generality of our statements render their proofs easy and routine, by using Dodgson condensation and/or Krattenthaler's factor exhaustion method.
paper_title: Trivializing generalizations of some izergin-korepin-type determinants
